Hey, listen!
This is a not-for-profit historical backup of Mario Royale, a browser experiment created by InfernoPlus.
All game assets, Super Mario, Super Mario Bros., and original game concept are property of Nintendo Co. Ltd.
We did not develop either game, and this project is purely for educational and historical purposes.
This game will be maintained and updated as deemed appropriate by those working behind the scenes.
